microsoft.hawaii.hawaiiClientLibraryBase

Class ServiceAgent<T extends ServiceResult>

  • java.lang.Object
    • microsoft.hawaii.hawaiiClientLibraryBase.ServiceAgent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Generic service result type which inherits ServiceResult type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AssociateIdAgent, CreateEndPointAgent, CreateGroupAgent, DeleteAgent, DeleteEndPointAgent, DeleteGroupAgent, DisassociateIdAgent, GetAgent, GetByKeyAgent, GetLanguagesForSpeakAgent, GetLanguagesForTranslateAgent, JoinGroupAgent, LeaveGroupAgent, LookupNameAgent, OcrAgent, PostableServiceAgent, PredictLocationAgent, ReceiveMessagesAgent, RegisterNameAgent, SendMessageAgent, SpeakAgent, SpeechGrammarsAgent, TranslateAgent, UnregisterNameAgent

    public abstract class ServiceAgent<T extends ServiceResult>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all Hawaii service agent classes. These agents are wrapping the communication tasks specific to each service. ServiceAgent provides functionality common to all these clases.

        boolean

      • OnCompleteRequest

        protected void OnCompleteRequest()
        A method can be overridden by sub classes. It is invoked after completing the service request. The implementation of this base class will invoke the client's "on complete" callback method. Classes that inherit from ServiceAgent can overwrite this method to further process the service call result before calling the client's "on complete" callback method. OnCompleteRequest void
